description:
Sota takes a day off work to take care of his younger sister, Nazuna, while she is sick in bed. In order to make up for his absense, everyone else jumps in to juggle Wagnaria`s hectic tasks. And just as the chaos reaches its apex...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aru Kaze no Hi ni..., Itsumo to Chigau Wagnaria
One Windy Day, an Unusual Wagnaria.
ある風邪の日に..., いつもと違うワグナリア
